short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Source Talent with the most effective Chrome Extension for Recruiters through Linkedin and Indeed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Arya Chrome Extension for Recruiters 

Arya's Chrome extension helps recruiters use advanced AI search parameters to identify relevant candidates directly on social networks like LinkedIn and shortlist them with a single click. Recruiters can also directly engage with these candidates through email and text outreach using the Chrome extension that sends them straight to Arya's Connect dashboard. Start composing text and emails using ChatGPT immediately without wasting time navigating multiple steps. 

 With Arya's Chrome extension, you do not have to pay separately for the expensive subscription if you do not want to. It can be used for both paid recruiter accounts and non-recruiter accounts.

It provides a seamless sourcing experience without disrupting recruiter workflow. With this extension, you can discover similar candidates anytime on these social channels and streamline talent as needed.
